properties.headline: Flood Warning issued January 11 at 5:49PM EST until January 15 at 2:30PM EST by NWS Cleveland OH
properties.description:
...The flood warning is cancelled for the following rivers in Ohio...

Sandusky River Above Fremont

...The flood warning continues for the following rivers in Ohio...

Huron River Near Milan
Blanchard River Near Findlay
Eagle Creek Above Findlay
Portage River At Woodville
Sandusky River At Tiffin
Maumee River Near Grand Rapids
Maumee River At Waterville
Scioto River Near Larue
Scioto River Near Prospect
Killbuck Creek Near Killbuck

The flood warning continues for
The Portage River At Woodville.
* Until Wednesday afternoon.
* At  5:30 PM Saturday the stage was...9.2 feet.
* Minor flooding is occurring and Moderate flooding is forecast.
* Flood stage is 9.0 feet.
* The river will rise to near 12.5 feet by Monday afternoon. The
river will fall below flood stage Wednesday morning.
* At 13.5 feet...Homes in Pemberville upstream of Woodville inundated
with a few feet of water and cut off. Water reaches the buildings
in the business district.
properties.instruction:
Never drive your car through flooded roadways. The water may be
deeper than it appears. Turn around...don't drown!

Stay tuned to NOAA weather radio and other local media for further
details and updates.
